value.title: What are Power BI data connectors and why should you care?

value.title: Append vs Merge in Power BI and Power Query

There are two types of combining queries; Merge, and Append. Database developers easily understand the difference, but the majority of

value.title: Exception Reporting in Power BI Catch the Error Rows in Power Query

If you build a reporting solution that the refresh of that fails everytime an error occurs, it is not a robust system. value.title: Power BI One Slicer to filter other slicers based on Items that has value only without BI Direction

How you can find all the products that this customer purchased or all customers who have purchased this product using two separate slicers.
